page.title: 10Poems by A.and M.Horovitz.
page.content: {Sheep on a Winter's Day.} Cold,bleak,windy fields With no horizon Mist covers the land. Sheep come in from the pasture Snow is on the way And their trough is full of ice. They hurry into their pen. At once they start champing the hay. Their faces are like black masks And their wool is beigy brown. Soon the joy of lambs!{ { Adam Horovitz {Primavera april's buds explode into bloom shaking last year's leaves out of their gloom like stars they beam through the darkest room {Michael Horovitz
